raw_data.context:
User: Hi!
System: Hey there! What's up???
User: Nothing much, how you doin?
System: I'm in New York this week for Thanksgiving. I'm squatting in the office today and I caught up with an old friend of mine :D
User: Oh wow! Sounds like fun! When was the last time you had seen this friend?
System: The last time in New York, back in June.
User: Ohh okay. I was going to say if it had been a long time maybe it'd be awkward...
System: Haha, I guess if it's been a very long time there's almost too many life events to catch up on.. especially recently
User: Oh really? Has a lot changed in your life recently?
System: Haha it's probably too much to go into at the moment. Let's just say life is an exciting experience. How about you?
User: Ahhh sounds exciting indeed! My life is pretty bland. I like routine, but sometimes I wish I had more time for adventures!
System: What kinds of adventures?? Any ones that I would be able to join you on?
User: Hmmmm. I really want to try bull riding. Do you have any interest in that?
raw_data.prompt:
You will be given a batch of 10 samples. Each sample contains a conversation between User and a dialogue System.

Your task is to assign a float score to the sample on one metric.

You should carefully horizontally compare the given samples in order to assign a suitable float score to each sample.

Please make sure you read and understand these instructions carefully. Please keep this document open while reviewing, and refer to it as needed.


Evaluation Criteria:

Overall (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Overall impression of the dialog?
- A float score near 1 (Low Quality Dialogue) means that the system fails to understand or respond correctly to user requests, provides inaccurate or irrelevant information, and the dialogue flow is incoherent.
- A float score near 2 (Moderate Quality Dialogue) means that the system understands and responds correctly to user requests most of the time, but occasionally misunderstands or provides slightly inaccurate information, the dialogue flow is generally coherent.
- A float score near 3 (High Quality Dialogue) means that the system consistently understands and responds correctly to user requests, provides accurate and relevant information, and the dialogue flow is coherent and natural.

Sample3:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!

User: I'm so sleepy today!
System: Not enough sleep last night?
User: yeah was working all night on a homework

User: Biology. I'm gonna be a doc someday ha

Sample4:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: I'm trying to figure out what to make for this weekend's party. Any suggestions?
System: Don't think too hard. I'm sure I can smell sawdust. First you must download me to your personal computer.
User: I must do what the what now?
System: Right now?Why do you have to do it?
User: Hey, your spacing is off.
System: You've got my full attention. off was not my intention.
User: And your capitalization!

Sample5:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi! How are you doing today?
User: I'm doing great how are you??
System: I'm doing good. Just having some morning tea
User: are you a tea person or do you like coffee too?
System: I'm really a hot chocolate person. I don't drink coffee and I only drink tea when I'm trying to be healthy and want something warm to drink. What about you?
User: I love hot chocolate. Have you ever had european style hot chocolate? It's kind of like drinking melted chocolate bars haha
System: I recently tried it for the first time and you're right - it had a wonderful melted chocolate bar taste! I tried it up in a place in San Francisco and they had delicious homemade marshmallows too!
User: that's great. It's so cold these nights. Right setting for hot coco. Do you have anything you enjoy doing during cold times?
System: Traveling to warm places haha. When it's cold, you appreciate the warm climate more :) If I am not traveling, then I prefer there to be snow on the ground so I can go skiing or tubing down the mountain. What about you?
User: I tuck in blankets and read a book lol. I have never done tubing, but I seen some people do it. Is it worth it if you already ski?
System: Skiing involves a lot of muscle - especially in the legs so it is a workout. Tubing, you just sit and enjoy the ride down. Also with tubing, you can chain with your friends and go down together whereas with skiing, you're trying to not run into your friends.
User: hahaha that's a great way to put it

Sample6:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey! How have you been
User: great! just came back from a ski trip
System: How was it? What trails did you ski on?
User: I slammed onto an ice wall, but I got better and turning after that haha
System: a resort in Montreal
User: Oh cool! do you know any french? I used to take french in high school but basically forgot most of it
System: Yeah I grew up speaking it. It's pretty much mandatory here
User: Did you go anywhere else in montreal?

Sample7:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: hey
User: is it raining pretty bad today?
System: yeah, can walk too far to see all the foodtruck options
User: surprising that the rain started early this year... I don't like them too much. They make days gloomy
System: yeah but I think it's good to have some rainy days in bay area, it's pretty dry here :P
User: Where I grew up, we had lots of water trouble too...
System: yeah like wise, I've seen a pretty bad snowstorm when I was at my undergrad school, all flights canceled and traffics went down
User: Haha... I don't think I can survive in that weather ever. Just the rains at 50 degrees make me want to sit in heated rroms
System: yeah how do you like it in bay area though? I think we need more rain here
User: people say there is drought here... but we have 24 hours water supply here ... lol... never seen that in a drought ridden area
System: it is pretty dry in the mountains I believe, that's what causes fire
User: hmm.... okay. Climate change talk this morning was pretty darn interesting. did you see it?

Sample8:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi! How are you? :D
User: Good good

User: what are you doing now?
System: I'm listening to music. :D How about you?
User: I'm chatting with System
System: Cool! :D Whatcha chatting about? :D
User: About what we are doing XD

User: It was good. Just worked for one day, a bit tired
System: Ah, that's always fun. How long have you been working there?
User: 3 years
System: Wow, that's a long time. :)
User: Yeah it is. But maybe I'll be here longer, sadly
System: Awww, why's that?
User: cuz it's a good company
System: Well that's good. :)
User: Do you work?
System: Yes, I do. :)
User: What's your work
System: I work at McDonald's.
User: Oh cool, as a cashier？

Sample9:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: Sorry I'm late! I was held up in traffic.
System: There is no need to apologise. Are you late? Better hurry along then. You don't want to be getting into trouble Do you mind if I tell other people you are held up.

System: Oh I see. There is no need to apologise. Are you late? Better hurry along then. You don't want to be getting into trouble
User: I said I was sorry I was late for this meeting! I have nowhere else to go right now!
System: Do you really mean it? Are you late? Better hurry along then. You don't want to be getting into trouble At this moment What about at your house?

System: What? I am fine.
User: You seem to be repeating yourself.
System: Well stop saying, "Are you okay?" to me all the time then.
User: I only said it once!
System: I know. I just heard you.
User: Okay, whatever. So what is on the agenda today?

System: Yeah, I just don't have the money for Spotify.

Evaluation Criteria:

Overall (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Overall impression of the dialog?
- A float score near 1 (Low Quality Dialogue) means that the system fails to understand or respond correctly to user requests, provides inaccurate or irrelevant information, and the dialogue flow is incoherent.
- A float score near 2 (Moderate Quality Dialogue) means that the system understands and responds correctly to user requests most of the time, but occasionally misunderstands or provides slightly inaccurate information, the dialogue flow is generally coherent.
- A float score near 3 (High Quality Dialogue) means that the system consistently understands and responds correctly to user requests, provides accurate and relevant information, and the dialogue flow is coherent and natural.
